shard_namespace_UPPER_description: The Biosecurity Bacteria Name Index ({{ shard_namespace_UPPER }}) is a tool for the biosecurity community that deals with bacteria names and their usage in the scientific literature, whether as a current name or synonym, for ICNP-named organisms that are used in a biosecurity context in Australia. {{ shard_namespace_UPPER }} does not recommend any particular taxonomy or nomenclature. For a listing of currently accepted scientific names, please use the Biosecurity Bacteria Checklist ({{ taxonomy_name }}) link above.
taxonomy_name_description: The Biosecurity Bacteria Checklist ({{ taxonomy_name }}) is a working taxonomy for use by biosecurity specialists in Australia.
description_html: This section of the National ex-Australia Species List infrastructure delivers names and taxonomies for organisms named according to the International Code of Nomenclature of Prokaryotes. The data comprise names, bibliographic information, and taxonomic concepts. The Biosecurity Bacteria Name Index ({{ shard_namespace_UPPER }}) provides names and bibliographic information. The Biosecurity Bacteria Checklist ({{ taxonomy_name }}) provides a working taxonomy.
